name: df-txp
body: |- wceq(ctxp(c0, c1), cin(ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c0), ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c1)))
comment: Define the tail cross of two classes. Membership in this class is defined by ~ txpss3v and ~ brtxp . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 31-Mar-2012.)
